thread.title: Ed Sheeran Releases TWO New Songs Castle On The Hill & Shape Of You — And Performs One LIVE!
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran Releases TWO New Songs Castle On The Hill & Shape Of You — And Performs One LIVE!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Ed Sheeran Releases TWO New Songs Castle On The Hill & Shape Of You — And Performs One LIVE!
text:
Now that's a surprise!
On Friday, Ed Sheeran made his triumphant return with new music by dropping not one, but TWO fresh new singles!
The tracks, titled Castle on the Hill and Shape of You , are the FIRST round of new music that Ed has made in about two years since his widely popular album, X !
Related: Ed Does A NSFW Cover Of Justin Bieber's Love Yourself 
Sheeran released a statement along with the new songs, saying:
"Hello 2017! I've been working hard on the new material and I hope you can be as excited about it as I am. I really wanted to show two different sides to my music that I'm equally as passionate about and I just knew I wanted to roll with two songs at the same time. I'm absolutely buzzing to be back."
Though we still don't know when the redhead's third album, ÷, will drop, we do get some bonus Ed has he stopped by to host BBC Radio 1 on Friday morning and performed Castle on the Hill... LIVE!
Ch-ch-check out Ed's new songs (below) as well as his Radio 1 appearance while we wait to hear more deets about the singer's upcoming album !
